name: test_login
description: Test validates the complete login workflow and successful authentication.
descriptionHtml:
Testing Login Functionality

Test verifies the authentication process functionality, including:

  • Navigation to the login page
  • User authentication with credentials
  • Successful redirect after login

The test performs the following checks:

  • Confirms initial navigation to the main page
  • Verifies successful login with valid credentials
  • Checks redirect to overview page after login
  • Validates user's authenticated state

Expected Results:

  • User should successfully authenticate with valid credentials
  • System should redirect to the overview page
  • User should be in logged-in state
statusMessage:
AssertionError: Failed to redirect to overview page after login
assert False
 +  where False = expect_url('https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/overview.htm')
 +    where expect_url = <pages.main_page.MainPage object at 0x7fdd503f3260>.expect_url
 +      where <pages.main_page.MainPage object at 0x7fdd503f3260> = <tests.test_login.TestLogin object at 0x7fdd50faab10>.main_page
statusTrace:
self = <tests.test_login.TestLogin object at 0x7fdd50faab10>

    @allure.story("User Authentication")
    @allure.severity(severity_level="CRITICAL")
    def test_login(self) -> None:
        """Test validates the complete login workflow and successful authentication."""
        self.main_page.navigate()
        assert self.main_page.expect_url(
            f"{BASE_URL}{MAIN_URL}"
        ), "URL does not match expected value"
    
        self.main_page.login(self.data.USERNAME, self.data.PASSWORD)
    
>       assert self.main_page.expect_url(
            f"{BASE_URL}{OVERVIEW_URL}"
        ), "Failed to redirect to overview page after login"

E       assert False

E        +      where <pages.main_page.MainPage object at 0x7fdd503f3260> = <tests.test_login.TestLogin object at 0x7fdd50faab10>.main_page
